Description:
You find yourself in front of a large lava waterfall, but you can see that climbing it is really dangerous.

Then you notice that the mosquito egg in your rucksack moves because of the heat, or so you think.

This could be a good place to try to hatch the egg but also to cook it, since you left the town you haven't eaten anything and you're getting hungry...
DescriptionAction: Do you want to cook it or do you want to try to hatch it?
